timeline.message:
fixes #907 Implement removeIf on HdfsBackedSortedSet
* Implemented removeIf on the supper class BufferedFileBackedSortedSet

timeline.author: FineAndDandy

replies.bodyText: nope, I wanted to put it back into a persisted state if it was previously persisted.
replies.author: ivakegg

replies.bodyText: But I get your point, if nothing changed then why rewrite the files.  I will create a separate ticket to add a mechanism to flip from loaded to persisted using the existing underlying files.
replies.author: ivakegg
